name: Droplet (XDA ShinigamiX)
description:
This is my submission for the MyFirstGameJam Summer 2018. The game is still a prototype as of now.

AD - Move left and right

Space - Jump

Wall jump - look around for wetspots on the walls you're able to wall jump

Ceiling Hang - If you see a wet spot on the ceiling try jumping at it (press "S" to dismount from ceiling)

Seeping and Emerging - If you see a soft patch of dirt try holding W or S

Objective - Go around and collect stars (This will not be the objective in the final game this was just something I threw in for the game jam)

Story - The current build really has no story at the moment. (The final story will be you attempting to reunite with your family but in order to do that you have to go through the water cycle )

-Hey guys first of all thanks for playing this little game! I originally had way more planned for this game but it got cut short due to time constraints but hey it's in a decent and playable state so enjoy and again thanks for playing!

Art by :BNNM
